formalMetadata.description: A page with an excerpt from a proposed "Constitution for the European Union: Italian version" (http://europa.eu.int/eur-lex/lex/LexUriServ/LexUriServ.do?uri=OJ:C:2004:310:0011:0040:IT:PDF). The html element has lang and xml:lang attributes with the value "tr", the language code for Turkish, instead of "it" for Italian.
formalMetadata.title: Incorrect lang and xml:lang attributes for content in Italian

testElement.specReference: Specifying the language of content: the lang attribute

purpose.p: This test case is intended to fail because the default human language is not correctly identified: the correct language is Italian, not Turkish.

expertGuidance.p: This test case can be evaluated automatically when using a test tool with reliable automatic language recognition for both Italian and Turkish, support for lang and xml:lang attributes and language tags.

functionalOutcome.p: The browser cannot find the default human language of the document.

techComment.p: The html element has incorrect lang and xml:lang attributes (tr for Turkish, instead of it for Italian).
This test case does not map to a WCAG 2.0 technique or failure.

functionalOutcome.p: The browser cannot find the primary language of the document.

techComment.p: The html element has incorrect lang and xml:lang attributes (tr for Turkish, instead of it for Italian).
This test case maps to technique H57: Using the lang attribute of the html element (http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/WD-WCAG20-TECHS-20060427/Overview.html#H57).
